com.bounswe.group7.web.controller

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bounswe.group7.web.controller.LoginController

  • @RestController
public class LoginController
extends Object
    Handles login and logout operations. Saving data to the session and erasing them is done in this rest controller class.
    Author:
    Batuhan

    • Method Detail

      • login

        @RequestMapping(value="/login",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView login(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                                  throws IOException
        Username and password is entered by the guest. By using, client method if this user exists in the system, the user logs in. User, id, token, username and authorities of the user are saved into session. After this, user is redirected to the home page.
        Parameters:
        request - -> username and password
        Returns:
        home_page or landing_page
        Throws:
        IOException

      • logout

        @RequestMapping(value="/logout",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView logout(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        When the user wants to logout, automatically sends a request. All data saved to the session, is removed.
        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:
        landing_page
